description:
Experience the revolution! The world's fastest taxi app is now ready for download with extra functions and a totally redefined user experience! Introducing Easy Taxi 3.0 -- everything you need and more in one beautiful app.
The sleek design encapsulates a dynamic interface, fare calculation, improved GPS algorithm, and a revamped search engine. Available exclusively for Apple users. Find out why more than 10 million users in 160 cities across 32 countries trust Easy Taxi! Enjoy the ride!
[Features]:
◉ Faster: Find and book taxis easily with the tap of a button - all on a single screen. Improved GPS algorithm, multiple search engines, and quicker taxi search.
◉ Safer: Set a destination to calculate the fare and the arrival time while tracking driver's identity and cab info. We thoroughly screen and train each driver to ensure that only those with clear history and best skills became our partners.
◉ More fun: You can now sign up with Facebook and apply discount vouchers inside the passengers app! Recent locations will be automatically displayed on the map. Message your driver while he is on the go and slide effortlessly to pay through your phone.
 
[How to use]:  
• Wait for the app to automatically locate your address using GPS
• Confirm your location and tap “Request taxi”
• Watch how Easy Taxi assigns a nearby driver. Follow him on the map and in minutes he’ll be at the location you requested.

 [Locations]:
You can hail a taxi with the app in the following places:
• Argentina: Buenos Aires, Cordoba, Rosario
• Bahrain: Manama
• Bolivia: Santa Cruz de la Sierra, La Paz, Cochabamba
• Brazil: São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Porto Alegre, Recife, Belo Horizonte, Brasília, Curitiba, and 60 more cities
• Chile: Santiago, Iquique
• Colombia: Barranquilla, Bogotá, Bucaramanga, Cali, Cartagena, Cúcuta, Ibagué, Manizales, Medellín, Pereira, Santa Marta, Villavicencio, Pasto, Armenia, Neiva, Palmira, Valledupar,Tulua, Monteria.
• Costa Rica: San José
• Ecuador: Quito, Guayaquil, Cuenca
• Egypt: Cairo
• Ghana: Accra
• Hong Kong: Hong Kong
• India: Mumbai
• Indonesia: Jakarta (Greater Jakarta - Jabodetabek)
• Jordan: Amman
• Kenya: Nairobi
• Kuwait: Kuwait City
• Malaysia: Kuala Lumpur, Johor Bahru
• Mexico: Mexico City, Queretaro, Cancun, Guadalajara, Leon, Monterrey, Puebla
• Nigeria: Lagos, Abuja
• Pakistan: Lahore, Islamabad, Karachi
• Panama: Panama City
• Paraguay: Assunción
• Peru: Lima, Arequipa, Cusco, Trujillo, Piura, Chiclayo
• Philippines: Manila, Cebu City
• Qatar: Doha
• Saudi Arabia: Riyhad, Jeddah
• Singapore: Singapore
• South Korea: Gwangju, Seoul, Sacheo, Yeosu, Suncheon, Jinju
• Taiwan: Taipei
• Thailand: Bangkok
• Uruguay: Montevideo
• Venezuela: Caracas, Maracaibo, Valencia
• Vietnam: Hanoi

[Awards & Recognition]:
The Easy Taxi application won multiple awards as a pioneer in taxi call service in Latin America. This includes Startup Weekend RIO, IBM SmartCamp Brazil, Startup Farm RIO, and TNW Awards.

Still hesitating? Check the ratings – nearly 90% of the reviews are 4- and 5 star!
◉ Need help or want to know more? Visit the global www.easytaxi.com page or drop an email to customerservice@easytaxi.com. Don’t forget to befriend Easy Taxi on Facebook and Twitter – just search for your country page!

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: Easy Taxi 3.0 - Book a Taxi Faster
